sentence: CLF is also endorsing Scott Baugh in California's 47th Congressional District, a Democratic controlled open seat; Tom Barrett in Michigan's 7th District, where Democratic Rep. Elissa Slotkins running for re-election; Tyler Kistner in Minnesota's 2nd District, where Democratic incumbent Angie Craig is seeking another term; Alex Skarlatos in Oregon's 4th District, a Democratic controlled open seat; and Lisa Scheller in Pennsylvania 7th, where Democratic Rep. Susan Wilds running for re-election.
title: Top outside group backing House Republicans makes second round of 2022 GOP endorsements
